analyzed: gang gis sbrang rtsi dang ni yang dag rtog pa med //

analyzed: lcags kyu med pa'i gnyis 'thung myos pa lta bu dang // yal ga'i ri dags shing la rab tu ma zhi ltar //

original: sems ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin phyogs su skor ba ste //
analyzed: sems ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin phyogs su skor ba ste //

original: de ni rang dbang yin na zhi ba yod min zhing //

original: de yi gnas pa yin na byed pa byas pa nyid //
analyzed: de yi gnas pa yin na byed pa byas pa nyid //

original: de phyir sems 'di ji ltar rnam par mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: de phyir sems 'di ji ltar rnam par mi g-yo ba //

analyzed: de ltar rab tu 'bad pa yis ni gyis mdzod cig / bza' ba tsam ni sman bzhin nges par bsten @91a * //

original: bya ste ; /'dir ni khong khro bya ba ma yin chags pa min //
analyzed: bya ste ; /'dir ni khong khro bya ba ma yin chags pa min //
translated: Do not be angry or attached to it,🔽but only to the extent that it wards off hunger

original: ji srid bkres pa nyid ni ldog pa'i ched du dang // lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'dzin pa yi ched du'o //🔽ji ltar nags su bung ba rnams kyis me tog ro //
analyzed: ji srid bkres pa nyid ni ldog pa'i ched du dang // lus kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'dzin pa yi ched du'o // ji ltar nags su bung ba rnams kyis me tog ro //

original: 'thung ste me tog rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin ;
analyzed: 'thung ste me tog rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin ;

original: / de bzhin dus kyi dbang las bsod snyoms rgyu ba ste //
analyzed: / de bzhin dus kyi dbang las bsod snyoms rgyu ba ste //

original: pha rol dad pa rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin //
analyzed: pha rol dad pa rnams ni nyams par byed ma yin //
translated: and does not diminish the faith of others.🔽There is no one who is a true carrier of the burden,

original: drang pos rtag par khur bar byed ces khur bya dang // skye bo sbyin pa po yang yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: drang pos rtag par khur bar byed ces khur bya dang // skye bo sbyin pa po yang yod pa ma yin te //

original: 'di na sbyor ba min las khur ba ltung ba ste //
analyzed: 'di na sbyor ba min las khur ba ltung ba ste //
translated: Here, the burden falls on the one who is not engaged,

original: ji ltar khur bu de ltar sbyin pa po yin no //🔽rnal 'byor rim las nyin mo mtha' dag phul nas dang // mtshan mo'i dang po'i thun dang cig shos dag kyang ste //
analyzed: ji ltar khur bu de ltar sbyin pa po yin no // rnal 'byor rim las nyin mo mtha' dag phul nas dang // mtshan mo'i dang po'i thun dang cig shos dag kyang ste //
translated: and the giver is like the one who carries the burden.🔽The yogi should give the whole day,🔽and the first and last periods of the night,

original: dran pa dang bcas snga ma'i cig shos la nyol la //
analyzed: dran pa dang bcas snga ma'i cig shos la nyol la //
translated: and sleep in the middle period, with mindfulness.

original: gnyid kyi tshe ni don med byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyid kyi tshe ni don med byed pa ma yin no //
translated: When sleeping, he should not act meaninglessly.

original: dus kyi me yis 'di na 'gro ba sreg pa na //
analyzed: dus kyi me yis 'di na 'gro ba sreg pa na //
translated: When the fire of time burns the world,

original: mtshan mo mtha' dag la ni gnyid par 'os pa su //
analyzed: mtshan mo mtha' dag la ni gnyid par 'os pa su //
translated: who deserves to sleep during the whole night?

original: nyon mongs dgra po dang mtshungs 'joms pa po rnams ni //
analyzed: nyon mongs dgra po dang mtshungs 'joms pa po rnams ni //
translated: Those who destroy the enemies, the afflictions,

original: snying la gnas pa yin na su yi gnyid log 'gyur //
analyzed: snying la gnas pa yin na su yi gnyid log 'gyur //
translated: which dwell in the heart, who would they be?

original: de phyir khyim na nag po'i sbrul rnams nyal ba ltar //
analyzed: de phyir khyim na nag po'i sbrul rnams nyal ba ltar //
translated: So, like black snakes in the house,

original: yid la nyes skyon sbrul rnams rab tu nyal ba rnams //
analyzed: yid la nyes skyon sbrul rnams rab tu nyal ba rnams //
translated: the faults and flaws of the mind lie hidden.

original: rigs pa dang ni rkang pa sman gyis ston nas su //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ni rkang pa sman gyis ston nas su //
translated: But when the physician of reason has shown them to be so,

original: gnyid log par 'os 'di las gzhan du ngo tsha'o //
analyzed: gnyid log par 'os 'di las gzhan du ngo tsha'o //
translated: it is shameful to continue to sleep.

original: ngo tsha rgyan nyid dang ni mchog gi gos yin zhing //
analyzed: ngo tsha rgyan nyid dang ni mchog gi gos yin zhing //
translated: Shame is the ornament, the best of garments,

original: ngo tsha lam las 'khyog pa rnams kyi lcags kyus te //
analyzed: ngo tsha lam las 'khyog pa rnams kyi lcags kyus te //
translated: the hook for those who have strayed from the path.

original: ngo tsha ldan pas de ltar gyur na 'jug bya zhing //
analyzed: ngo tsha ldan pas de ltar gyur na 'jug bya zhing //
translated: When it is present, the virtuous practice;

original: ngo tshas rnam par spangs ba'i yon tan rnams kyis spangs //🔽ji srid pa la skyes bu ngo tsha dang bcas pa //
analyzed: ngo tshas rnam par spangs ba'i yon tan rnams kyis spangs // ji srid pa la skyes bu ngo tsha dang bcas pa //
translated: when it is absent, the qualities are lost.🔽As long as a person is endowed with shame,

original: de srid de yi mi yi ngo tsha nyid yin te //
analyzed: de srid de yi mi yi ngo tsha nyid yin te //
translated: he is a human being, and shame is his.

original: don dang don min rnams la rnam dpyod med pa ni //
analyzed: don dang don min rnams la rnam dpyod med pa ni //
translated: But when he is without discrimination between right and wrong,

original: ngo tshas rnam par dman pa phyugs dang mnyam pa'o //
analyzed: ngo tshas rnam par dman pa phyugs dang mnyam pa'o //
translated: he is the equal of cattle, and shame is lost.

original: gang yang yan lag nyid lag rnams ni ral gris gcod //
analyzed: gang yang yan lag nyid lag rnams ni ral gris gcod //
translated: When a man cuts off his own limbs with a sword,

original: der yang yid kyis nyes pa bya ba ma yin zhing //
analyzed: der yang yid kyis nyes pa bya ba ma yin zhing //
translated: And even there, mental faults are not to be committed.

original: zhi ba ma yin dag ni brjod par mi bya ste //
analyzed: zhi ba ma yin dag ni brjod par mi bya ste //
translated: One should not speak of what is not peaceful.

original: bdag gi de yis khyed cag rnams kyi bar chod yin //
analyzed: bdag gi de yis khyed cag rnams kyi bar chod yin //
translated: That is an obstacle for you.

original: bzod pa dang mnyam dka' thub yod pa ma yin zhing //
analyzed: bzod pa dang mnyam dka' thub yod pa ma yin zhing //
translated: There is no austerity equal to patience.

original: gang gi bzod pa de yis stobs dang brtan pa ste //
analyzed: gang gi bzod pa de yis stobs dang brtan pa ste //
translated: Through patience, one gains strength and firmness.

original: gang rnams pha rol rnams las @91b rtsub mo mi bzod pa //
analyzed: gang rnams pha rol rnams las @91b rtsub mo mi bzod pa //
translated: Those who cannot bear the harsh words of others

original: de rnams chos byed rnams kyi lugs min grol ba min //
analyzed: de rnams chos byed rnams kyi lugs min grol ba min //
translated: are not in the Dharma tradition and are not liberated.

original: chos kyi 'byed pa po dang grags pa'i 'joms pa po //
analyzed: chos kyi 'byed pa po dang grags pa'i 'joms pa po //
translated: The destroyer of Dharma and fame,

original: gzugs kyi dgra bo dang ni snying gi me yin te //
analyzed: gzugs kyi dgra bo dang ni snying gi me yin te //
translated: the enemy of beauty and the fire of the heart,

original: khro ba de yis go skabs rab 'byam mi sbyin zhing //
analyzed: khro ba de yis go skabs rab 'byam mi sbyin zhing //
translated: anger does not give an opportunity

original: yon tan rnams kyi dgra bo de 'dra gzhan ma yin //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi dgra bo de 'dra gzhan ma yin //
translated: and there is no other enemy of good qualities like this.

original: yongs su bsil ba'i chu las glog gi me bzhin du //🔽ji ltar rab byung las ni khro ba 'gal ba ste //
analyzed: yongs su bsil ba'i chu las glog gi me bzhin du // ji ltar rab byung las ni khro ba 'gal ba ste //
translated: Just as lightning is an enemy of the cool water,🔽anger is an enemy of the ordained.🔽Just as anger is not contradictory for the ordained,

original: de ltar khyim pa rnams kyi skyes pa mi 'gal te //
analyzed: de ltar khyim pa rnams kyi skyes pa mi 'gal te //
translated: it is not contradictory for the laity.

original: chags ldan de rnams de la dam bca' ma yin no //
analyzed: chags ldan de rnams de la dam bca' ma yin no //
translated: But the lustful are not so committed to it.🔽Seeing the hair of the beautiful ones far away, touching the head,

original: mdzes pa'i skra ni rgyang ring mgo la reg nas dang // rnam par 'gyur ba'i gos dang lhung bzed mthong nas dang // gzhan las mthar gyur spyod pa rnam par bsams nas su //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i skra ni rgyang ring mgo la reg nas dang // rnam par 'gyur ba'i gos dang lhung bzed mthong nas dang // gzhan las mthar gyur spyod pa rnam par bsams nas su //
translated: Seeing the clothes and the bowl of the one who has changed, thinking about the conduct of the one who has gone to the end,

original: snying la skyes pa'i nga rgyal rab tu spang bar bya //
analyzed: snying la skyes pa'i nga rgyal rab tu spang bar bya //
translated: One should completely abandon the pride that has arisen in the heart.

original: khyim la brten pa khengs pa ldan pa rnams kyi yang //
analyzed: khyim la brten pa khengs pa ldan pa rnams kyi yang //
translated: Even for those who are puffed up, who are attached to the home,

original: nga rgyal rnam par 'phel ba 'joms pa'i phyir yin na //
analyzed: nga rgyal rnam par 'phel ba 'joms pa'i phyir yin na //
translated: It is for the purpose of destroying the increase of pride.

original: slong mo za bas bdag nyid yongs su rtog pa po //
analyzed: slong mo za bas bdag nyid yongs su rtog pa po //
translated: The one who eats alms food is the one who examines himself,

original: thar pa la dmigs skra bzhar rnams kyi sngon nyid do //
analyzed: thar pa la dmigs skra bzhar rnams kyi sngon nyid do //
translated: The one who has the shaven head is focused on liberation.

original: ngan g-yo dang ni chos kyi mtshams sbyor yod min te //
analyzed: ngan g-yo dang ni chos kyi mtshams sbyor yod min te //
translated: There is no connection between deceit and the Dharma,

original: gang phyir 'di las 'khyog po nyid ni bsnyen mi bya //
analyzed: gang phyir 'di las 'khyog po nyid ni bsnyen mi bya //
translated: Because crookedness is not to be attended to in this.

original: ngan g-yo nyid dang sgyu ni slu ba'i don du ste //
analyzed: ngan g-yo nyid dang sgyu ni slu ba'i don du ste //
translated: Deceit and trickery are for the purpose of deceiving,

original: chos kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi ba slu bya yod ma yin //
analyzed: chos kyi bdag nyid rnams kyi ba slu bya yod ma yin //
translated: But for those who have the nature of the Dharma, there is no deception.

original: gang zhig rgya chen rnams las sdug bsngal 'ongs pa ste //
analyzed: gang zhig rgya chen rnams las sdug bsngal 'ongs pa ste //
translated: Suffering comes from the great,

original: nyung ngu 'dod la 'ong ba ma yin de dang bral //
analyzed: nyung ngu 'dod la 'ong ba ma yin de dang bral //
translated: not from the desire for little.

original: de yi phyir yang nyung du 'dod nyid bsnyen bya ste //
analyzed: de yi phyir yang nyung du 'dod nyid bsnyen bya ste //
translated: Therefore, one should cultivate the desire for little,

original: gang zhig yon tan rnams kyis rdzogs byed kye ma ci //🔽de ni bkren pa'i lta ba rnams la mi 'jigs shing //
analyzed: gang zhig yon tan rnams kyis rdzogs byed kye ma ci // de ni bkren pa'i lta ba rnams la mi 'jigs shing //
translated: which is completed by the qualities.🔽That is not the view of the poor,

original: dbang po rnams las gang zhig cung zad 'jigs min la //
analyzed: dbang po rnams las gang zhig cung zad 'jigs min la //
translated: nor is it the fear of the senses.

original: gang zhig thos nas med ces mya ngan med pa ste //
analyzed: gang zhig thos nas med ces mya ngan med pa ste //
translated: Having heard it, one is not without grief,

original: gang gis nyung ngu 'dod de de yi thar pa min //
analyzed: gang gis nyung ngu 'dod de de yi thar pa min //
translated: but one is without the desire for little.🔽If one desires liberation, one should cultivate contentment,

original: gal te grol bar 'dod na tshim pa bsnyen mdzod dang // tshim pa na ni 'dir bde de 'di chos yin zhing //
analyzed: gal te grol bar 'dod na tshim pa bsnyen mdzod dang // tshim pa na ni 'dir bde de 'di chos yin zhing //
translated: for contentment is happiness in this world and the next.

original: tshim pa rnams ni sar yang bde bar gnyid log ste //
analyzed: tshim pa rnams ni sar yang bde bar gnyid log ste //
translated: The contented sleep happily on the ground,🔽but the discontented burn in heaven.

original: tshim med rnams ni mtho ris na yang rnam par sreg / phyug kyang tshim pa med pa rtag tu dbul po ste //
analyzed: tshim med rnams ni mtho ris na yang rnam par sreg / phyug kyang tshim pa med pa rtag tu dbul po ste //
translated: The discontented are always poor, even if rich.

original: dbul yang tshim pa dang ldan rtag tu phyug po nyid //🔽tshim pa med pa sdug pa'i yul rnams dang 'bye zhing //
analyzed: dbul yang tshim pa dang ldan rtag tu phyug po nyid // tshim pa med pa sdug pa'i yul rnams dang 'bye zhing //
translated: Even if poor, they are content and always rich.🔽The discontented are separated from their loved ones,

original: tshim pas 'gro ba ngal ba ldan la mya ngan byed //🔽zhi @92a * //
analyzed: tshim pas 'gro ba ngal ba ldan la mya ngan byed // zhi @92a * //
translated: and the weary are made miserable by their loved ones.

original: ba'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'dod rnams kyis //
analyzed: ba'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'dod rnams kyis //
translated: Those who desire the highest peace

original: de ltar tshogs la dga' ba rnams su 'gyur mi bya //
analyzed: de ltar tshogs la dga' ba rnams su 'gyur mi bya //
translated: should not become attached to the pleasures of society.

original: zhi ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rgyu phyir 'jig rten na //
analyzed: zhi ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rgyu phyir 'jig rten na //
translated: Because of their single-minded devotion to peace,

original: brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyis kyang re 'dod byed //
analyzed: brgya byin la sogs lha rnams kyis kyang re 'dod byed //
translated: even the gods, Indra and the rest, envy them.

original: chags po sdug bsngal gyi ni gnas pa'i shing yin te ;
analyzed: chags po sdug bsngal gyi ni gnas pa'i shing yin te ;
translated: The greedy are the trees of suffering;

original: / rang gi skye bo la 'am skye la chags pa spangs //
analyzed: / rang gi skye bo la 'am skye la chags pa spangs //
translated: they are attached to their own families and to birth.

original: chags pa rnam rgyas sdug bsngal la ni 'jig rten na //
analyzed: chags pa rnam rgyas sdug bsngal la ni 'jig rten na //
translated: The world, attached to the growth of suffering,

original: gnyis 'thung 'khogs pa 'dam la bzhin du chags par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyis 'thung 'khogs pa 'dam la bzhin du chags par 'gyur //
translated: is attached like an old elephant to the mud.

original: rtag par rab zhugs chu yi rgyun ni mnyen na yang //
analyzed: rtag par rab zhugs chu yi rgyun ni mnyen na yang //
